attributes.action: As EU nationals and UK residents we want to be included in a Second Referendum.
attributes.additional_details: We want all European Nationals living in the UK, just like in the Scottish Independence Referendum, to have a voice.
attributes.background: We are all European Nationals who have contributed to society and paid taxes. We were not able to vote on June 23rd. We want our voices heard too in this momentous decision affecting all our lives, jobs and future prosperity and  demand to be included in a Second Referendum.
